title: Bloomberg Markets: Clough on GE, Zaleski on Airbnb in Mexico
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Clough on GE, Zaleski on Airbnb in Mexico
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Rick Clough Industrials Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing oil's negative impact on General Electric earnings. Olivia Zaleski Technology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Airbnb using Mexico City as test case for taxes and regulation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
